text: Mapogo Rio "Yanga" Gcilisha Maphakane (born 23 August 1988), is a South African football (soccer) defender who currently plays for Tornado F.C. in the SAFA Second Division. == Career == Throughout his career played in the National First Division clubs. In 2014, he moved to play in the SAFA Second Division club Tornado F.C. 18 January 2015 entered the field in the starting lineup in the Nedbank Cup match against Orlando Pirates, where he earned his second yellow card and was sent off.http://www.dailysun.co.za/sport/2015-02-18-cup-of-upsetstornado-fc-coach- we-can-beat-bucs == External links == * ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:F.C. title: Yanga Gcilisha
